title: Does morality mean blind obedience? - Quora

response.answer_text: No not at all. One should have one’s own morality and let others live by theirs. Somebody whom you care for doing something you don’t approve of. Even then you can support him/her in bad times, without impacting your morality. The point is support does not mean approval.
No. Morality is meaningful only when you find your own truth through experience and thought.
